spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent alignment and adjacency. Almost all doors and windows match the 2D layout perfectly. Minor discrepancy in the door swing direction for the bedroom.

structural_fidelity.notes: No hallucinated rooms or missing areas. Floating model on dark background is executed perfectly with no text labels or measurement lines.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement in the living room, kitchen, bedroom, and dining area is highly accurate and maintains proper scale.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Follows low-poly flat color style. The camera is slightly more 'top-down' than a traditional 45-degree isometric, but composition is centered and clean.

detected_errors.description: The bedroom door swing orientation is reversed compared to the floor plan.
